timeline.message: slightly reduce PatternToken size by using bytes instead of ints in fields

timeline.bodyText: This may be rare, but it should be possible to have a min occurrence of e.g. 2.
timeline.author: danielnaber

replies.bodyText: Yes, but should we do so? There's min="x" in the XML and I think this should allow values > 1, even if this is rare.
replies.author: danielnaber

replies.bodyText:
I don't know, I only took existing contracts and optimized based on them :)
I think, in the unlikely case where min="2" is really-really needed, it can be simulated by creating two similar <token> tags.
replies.author: donnerpeter

replies.bodyText: Ah sorry, I missed the fact that the restriction to 0 or 1 existed forever...
replies.author: danielnaber
